wmndsLabelProps.name: contentText
wmndsLabelProps.description: Required. Specifies the text that will be included in the label. If contentHTML is provided this is not required and will be ignored.

wmndsLabelProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsLabelProps.description: Required. Specifies the text that will be included in the label as HTML. If contentText is provided, this is not required.

wmndsLabelProps.name: for
wmndsLabelProps.description: Required. Specifies the id of the element this label should link to.
